questions.text: Which standard is important for interoperability in IIoT?
What does OPC UA stand for?
options: Optimized Protocol for Cloud Unified Access

questions.text: Which organization develops standards for IIoT, including the Industrial Internet Reference Architecture (IIRA)?
What is the purpose of the Industrial Internet Reference Architecture (IIRA)?
options: To provide a specific product implementation
To offer a common framework and vocabulary for IIoT systems
To mandate the use of specific programming languages
To regulate the price of IIoT devices
questions.correctAnswer: To offer a common framework and vocabulary for IIoT systems

questions.text: What is a key benefit of standardization in IIoT?
options: It ensures that devices from different manufacturers can work together
It reduces the need for security
questions.correctAnswer: It ensures that devices from different manufacturers can work together
